type.name: org.gradle.api.reporting.DirectoryReport
type.description: * A directory based report to be created.

method.name: getEntryPoint
method.description: * Returns the entry point of a directory based Report * * This can be the index.html file in a HTML report * * @return the entry point of the report or * {@link org.gradle.api.reporting.DirectoryReport#getDestination()} * if no entry point defined *

property.name: entryPoint
property.description: * Returns the entry point of a directory based Report * * This can be the index.html file in a HTML report * * @return the entry point of the report or * {@link org.gradle.api.reporting.DirectoryReport#getDestination()} * if no entry point defined *
